dataList.name: 막힌길_뚫기
dataList.desc:
A dilapidated wall blocks our path.
There's a device on it with a label that says "Pick up your entry cards here". Next to it is a dial of sorts.

'Looks like they won't let us through so easily.'
'Is anyone particularly good with these devices? I can't seem to figure it out...'

dataList.name: 부적_떼기
dataList.desc:
There are several talismans glued to the wall.

I can feel the wind blowing through the barely visible cracks on the wall.

'Seems like there's something on the other side.'

Maybe there's a hidden passageway here?

The Sinners take a moment to investigate the room, and find a wall with conspicuously arranged talismans of different colors.

'Ohh~ These must be colors that match each of the cardinal directions~'
'Looks like we'll have to peel these talismans in the correct order.'

Should we try peeling the talismans?

dataList.name: 부적_떼기_북
dataList.desc:
There's something written on the blue talisman to the West.

Looks like they're indicating that this is the first talisman to be removed.

When I remove the talisman, the walls begin to shake.

Which one should I remove next?

result:
The walls stop shaking, but something feels off.

And right on cue, the host's vibrant voice begins blasting from the speakers.

'Contestants who failed the puzzle should be punished, don't you think?'

There was a sound of wooden things clattering...
And some doors swing open as wooden dummies rush out.

The walls stop shaking, but something feels off.

And right on cue, the host's vibrant voice begins blasting from the speakers.

'Contestants who failed the puzzle should be punished, don't you think?'

There was a sound of wooden things clattering...
And some doors swing open as wooden dummies rush out.

The walls stop shaking, but something feels off.

And right on cue, the host's vibrant voice begins blasting from the speakers.

'Contestants who failed the puzzle should be punished, don't you think?'

There was a sound of wooden things clattering...
And some doors swing open as wooden dummies rush out.

dataList.name: 부적_떼기_중앙
dataList.desc:
I remove the red talisman in the North.

The walls are now shaking with greater intensity.

Which one should we peel next?

result:
The walls stop shaking, but something feels off.

And right on cue, the host's vibrant voice begins blasting from the speakers.

'Contestants who failed the puzzle should be punished, don't you think?'

There was a sound of wooden things clattering...
And some doors swing open as wooden dummies rush out.

The walls stop shaking, but something feels off.

And right on cue, the host's vibrant voice begins blasting from the speakers.

'Contestants who failed the puzzle should be punished, don't you think?'

There was a sound of wooden things clattering...
And some doors swing open as wooden dummies rush out.

dataList.name: 부적_떼기_서
dataList.desc:
I remove the yellow talisman in the center.

The walls are now shaking with greater intensity.

Which one should we peel next?

result:
The walls stop shaking, but something feels off.

And right on cue, the host's vibrant voice begins blasting from the speakers.

'Contestants who failed the puzzle should be punished, don't you think?'

There was a sound of wooden things clattering...
And some doors swing open as wooden dummies rush out.

dataList.name: 부적_떼기_끝
dataList.desc:
I remove the white talisman in the East.

The walls are shaking like they're about to crumble any minute.

There's just one more talisman to peel.

result:
The wall crumbles, opening a new path forward.

I find some twinkling coins strewn about the debris.

dataList.name: 붉은_출입증_획득_전투
dataList.desc:
Ahem. You must be Jia Baoyu... and his clan, right?'

'I, uh... got separated from my faction when the walls suddenly burst from the ground.'

'Some are still with me, but I don't think I'll get very far like this...'

'Can you help me find where the rest of my faction is?'

'Hey, if you help me out today, I'll look out for you when I become the Family Hierarch.'

'C'mon, man. Help me out!'

options.message:
Hand over the Entry Card.
<size=75%><color=#a16a3b>Choice unlocked with the 'Worn Entry Card'</color></size>
options.messageDesc: Gain an Artifact
result:
This guy is pretty annoying...

But we don't have any reason to pick a fight with him when we don't know how many fights we've got ahead of us. It's not like he's being aggressive.

Instead of starting a fight, I hand him the used entry card.

'We also picked up something like that, but... it turned out to be pretty useless.'

'Here's hoping this one'll be better. Well... I guess I'll exchange your card for mine. Toss it or keep it, up to you.'

'Oh, also... I picked up this weird Bolus from another candidate. Seemed a bit fishy to me, so... I guess I'll let you take care of it.'

'Well, that's all. Hey, I won't go so easy on you the next time we meet, so watch yourself.'

options.message: Eliminate him and take his coins.
options.messageDesc: Begin a combat encounter. Win to gain coin(s).
result:
Just as I was about to explain to the Sinners that we don't necessarily have to fight...

... I mean, do we necessarily have to help him?

So, instead, I make a suggestion to the Sinners that we should probably just beat him up and take his coins. Most Sinners nod in agreement.

'W-what the hell? Seriously? You're gonna fight me? Do you have any idea who I am? I'm the eminent Shi family's—'

The Sinners start beating him up before the conversation got any longer than it has to be.

dataList.name: 죄수_꽃뜯기
dataList.desc: One speaks a hollow lamentation, The other yearns in an empty desire. One is a moon on the water's surface, a reflection, And the other is a blossom's image in a mirror. Flowers have bloomed over the bodies of the prisoners. I don't see any movement... looks like they're all dead. 'These flowers possess... the augmentative qualities of H Corp.' 'They will most likely provide some advantage in the battles to come.' Which flower should we pick?

options.messageDesc: Select to gain an Artifact
result:
We pick the lotus flower.
The flower transforms into a small Bolus,
and the other flowers blossom in the mirror.

Let the prisoners rest in peace...
We move on, after paying our respects to the dead.

options.messageDesc: Select to gain an Artifact
result:
We pick the red spider lily.
The flower transforms into a small Bolus,
and the other flowers blossom in the mirror.

Let the prisoners rest in peace...
We move on, after paying our respects to the dead.

options.messageDesc: Select to gain an Artifact
result:
We pick the nameless herb.
The herb transforms into a small Bolus,
and the other flowers blossom in the mirror.

Let the prisoners rest in peace...
We move on, after paying our respects to the dead.

dataList.name: 환_도박
dataList.desc:
We enter a new room and see a bound prisoner next to a Bolus on a table.
There, we see a candidate standing around as though they've been waiting for someone to arrive.

'Ah, now we have enough people for this special game to commence!'

'Please direct your attention to the Bolus on the table! Observe it well!'

'It is a Bolus currently in development here at H Corp; it is yet to be commercialized for mass-market use.'

'Apparently it can help restore your vitality once taken, but... let's see how true that is, shall we?'

'Do you think this is indeed a successful new product, or... is it a failure?'

'Now's the time to place your bets with your coins! Guess—is it a success, or a failure?'

'The candidate who gets this question right gains all the coins in the pool!'

dataList.name: 환_도박_코인_성공
dataList.desc:
The other candidate bets on 'failure'.

How many coins should we wager?

options.message:
1 coin.
<size=75%><color=#a16a3b>Choice unlocked when carrying 1 or more coin(s)</color></size>
options.messageDesc:
Win the bet to gain a few coins
Lose the bet, and relinquish the coins you wagered
result:
We bet a coin, and the other candidate bets a coin as well.

'Alrighty, let's check out what happens, then!'

The condemned swallows the Bolus, but they look to be at peace.
We wait a little longer, and the flower growing from the prisoner grows more vibrant.

'How wonderful! The Bolus was a success, it seems!'
'The candidate who bet on it being a success gains the coins...'
'... while the candidate who bet on it being a failure must submit their coins!'

We bet a coin, and the other candidate bets a coin as well.

'Alrighty, let's check out what happens, then!'

The prisoner swallows the Bolus, and immediately begins screaming with pain.
He drops to the floor unconscious after wildly writhing and thrashing around for a minute.

'Oh, what a shame. It was a failure.'
'The candidate who bet on it being a failure gains the coins...'
'... while the candidate who bet on it being a success must submit their coins!'

options.message:
2 coins.
<size=75%><color=#a16a3b>Choice unlocked when carrying 2 or more coin(s)</color></size>
options.messageDesc:
Win the bet to gain a moderate amount of coins
Lose the bet, and relinquish the coins you wagered
result:
We bet two coins, and the other candidate bets two coins as well.

'Alrighty, let's check out what happens, then!'

The prisoner swallows the Bolus, but they look to be at peace.
We wait a little longer, and the flower growing from the condemned grows more vibrant.

'How wonderful! The Bolus was a success, it seems!'
'The candidate who bet on it being a success gains the coins...'
'... while the candidate who bet on it being a failure must submit their coins!'

We bet two coins, and the other candidate bets two coins as well.

'Alrighty, let's check out what happens, then!'

The prisoner swallows the Bolus, and immediately begins screaming with pain.
He drops to the floor unconscious after wildly writhing and thrashing around for a minute.

'Oh, what a shame. It was a failure.'
'The candidate who bet on it being a failure gains the coins...'
'... while the candidate who bet on it being a success must submit their coins!'

options.message:
3 coins.
<size=75%><color=#a16a3b>Choice unlocked when carrying 3 or more coin(s)</color></size>
options.messageDesc:
Win the bet to gain a large bundle of coins
Lose the bet, and relinquish the coins you wagered
result:
We bet three coins, and the other candidate bets three coins as well.

'Alrighty, let's check out what happens, then!'

The prisoner swallows the Bolus, but they look to be at peace.
We wait a little longer, and the flower growing from the condemned grows more vibrant.

'How wonderful! The Bolus was a success, it seems!'
'The candidate who bet on it being a success will gain the coins!'
'Also, here a bonus coin for your boldness!'
'The candidate who bet on it being a failure, please submit your coins!'

We bet three coins, and the other candidate bets three coins as well.

'Alrighty, let's check out what happens, then!'

The prisoner swallows the Bolus, and immediately begins screaming with pain.
He drops to the floor unconscious after wildly writhing and thrashing around for a minute.

'Oh, what a shame. It was a failure.'
'The candidate who bet on it being a failure will gain the coins!'
'Also, here a bonus coin for your boldness!'
'The candidate who bet on it being a success, please submit your coins!'

options.message: Gambling isn't worth the risk. Let's back out.
result:
'Oh no... Was this little gamble too scary for you?'

'It might be a bit tough to navigate this game going forward, with such a wimpy heart!'

Gambling always carries a risk.
We leave the room, leaving the prisoner and the other candidate behind.

dataList.name: 환_도박_코인_실패
dataList.desc:
The other candidate bets on 'success'.

How many coins should we wager?

options.message:
1 coin.
<size=75%><color=#a16a3b>Choice unlocked when carrying 1 or more coin(s)</color></size>
options.messageDesc:

'Oh, what a shame. It was a failure.'

'The candidate who bet on it being a success, please submit your coins!'

We bet three coins, and the other candidate bets three coins as well.

The prisoner swallows the Bolus, but they look to be at peace.
We wait a little longer, and the flower growing from the condemned grows more vibrant.

'Also, here a bonus coin for your boldness!'
'The candidate who bet on it being a failure, please submit your coins!'

options.message: Gambling isn't worth the risk. Let's back out.
result:
'Oh no... Was this little gamble too scary for you?'

'It might be a bit tough to navigate this game going forward, with such a wimpy heart!'

Gambling always carries a risk.
We leave the room, leaving the prisoner and the other candidate behind.

dataList.name: 낭떠러지_도전
dataList.desc: No wisdom nor virtue can change the past and the future, and human connections and fate make strangers of neighbors. 'Welcome, candidates! Congratulations on making it to the basement!' 'Did you know that there are far more opportunities down here to collect those coins that you all want?' 'In fact, there are so many opportunities that... there's one right under your feet, in that hole!' 'Who will dare make the dark descent to claim the coins?!' The hole leads into the pitch-black darkness of the building ruins. We don't need to go down there to know that it's probably a pretty risky trek. We do need the coins, but... this might be too big a risk to take. What if we get injured or, even worse, killed? What should we do?

options.messageDesc: Run a Lust, Gluttony, and Envy Advantage check. Pass to gain coin(s).

result:
Collecting coins is important, but I don't want to potentially throw the Sinners' lives away for nothing this early in the game. There are just too many variables.
We decide to move on without delving into the hole.

dataList.name: 죄인_고문
dataList.desc:
We enter the room to find a condemned of Hongyuan bound to a wall.
In front of him are several punitive weapons like whips and batons.

'The man who sits before you is a prisoner of H Corp. He is a condemned who has committed a grave crime.'
'Punish the condemned, candidates, and you'll be rewarded with coins!'

What should we do?

options.messageDesc: Run a Gluttony and Pride Advantage check. Pass to gain coin(s).

options.message: We won't punish them. Refuse to play by their rules.
options.messageDesc: Begin a combat encounter. Win to gain coin(s).
result:
The prisoner already seems to be in a great deal of pain, a side effect of some experiment.
Sure, he's supposed to be one of the condemned, but... I don't think we have either the reason or the right to punish him...
After a brief discussion with the Sinners, I decide to end his suffering instead.

dataList.name: 항아리_보기_뽀개기
dataList.desc:
We enter a new room with a collection of jars at its center.
I wonder if they're Xue Pan's jars he didn't get to use?

I notice that one of the jars is cracked open.
There's a sound coming from within...

Maybe someone's trapped in there, but...
... I don't know if it's a good idea to fiddle with these things.

What should we do?

options.messageDesc: Run a Gloom Advantage check. Pass to gain an Artifact.
Begin a combat encounter. Win to gain coin(s).
result:
We'll be taking an undue risk by opening and peering into these suspicious jars.
Leaving them here'll pose a danger not only to us but... also to everyone coming in contact with them.

After some contemplation, we decide to break every jar in this room.

dataList.name: 타임어택_인형_전투
dataList.desc: Resentment is an avenging cycle of infinite weight, every meeting and reunion an immutable destiny; thus, karma of one’s previous life measures their worldly stay before the final flight. Wealth in the twilight of life is a fortune most rare; those who understand this leave their home for temples, and those who are seduced by it fill their time with empty air. Birds, their bellies full with feed, flutter away to the forest; the field of white snow remains pristine, nary a footstep marring its immaculacy. 'I see a candidate who just lost a bunch of coins!' 'Someone among the audience wishes to grant an opportunity to rebound!' 'Well, seems like... we'll have to send you some wooden dummies to recoup your lost coins!'

options.messageDesc: Begin a combat encounter. Win to gain coin(s).
result:
We need to recoup the coins we've lost. Let's challenge the wooden dummies.
The Sinners and I are in agreement.
At this moment, we need rest more than we do coins.

dataList.name: 공포_견디기_내기
dataList.desc: Streams turn crimson with fallen petals, and unspeakable sorrow becomes a vast, innumerable system of roots; thus, the unresolved resentment blames naught but the springtime breeze. There are two large jars in the room, with two mysterious devices hanging from above them. The host's voice booms from the speakers the moment we approach the jars. 'Another chance to earn yourself some coin!' 'The conditions are simple: remain as long as you can inside those jars.' 'Try sending in a clan member who's not so easily rattled, and pick up your coins! Easy, right?'

dataList.name: 붉은_출입증_사용
dataList.desc: Springtime’s dream scatters like clouds in the wind, and falling petals float away on the stream; thus, to every son and daughter, we pose this question: why seek and wander for such vain suffering? There's another candidate in this room. The moment we enter the threshold, the door shuts behind us, and the host's voice booms from the speakers once again. 'Defeat the opposing candidate, and be granted the opportunity to find yourself a new path with even better opportunities!' 'But... we don't want to make this fight too boring, do we? Let's add some variables.' With a heavy thunking noise, suspicious plumes of smoke begin to seep from the ground. The Sinners who inhaled it begin to cough violently. ... That can't be good.

options.messageDesc: Begin a combat encounter. Win to gain coin(s) and open a new path on the map.
result: Let's quickly defeat the enemies before the Sinners take too much damage.

options.message:
Use the Entry Card to unlock the door and leave.
<size=75%><color=#a16a3b>Choice unlocked with the 'Red Entry Card'</color></size>
options.messageDesc: A new path opens up on the map
result: This is not a good time to fight another candidate. As we are wondering if there was any way out of this, we notice a locking mechanism with a card reader on it. Hey, maybe we can use the entry card that the candidate we met earlier gave us. I tap the card against the reader, just in case it works. Entry authorized. The door unlocks with a beep. We slip out of the room as soon as the door opens... ... and we leave before the other candidate notices.

dataList.name: 가문_기물_획득
dataList.desc:
'Well, whichever method you used to arrive in this room... congratulations are in order!'
'As a reward for finding this secret room... feel free to take a helpful artifact! Just one, though.`
`Also... some of these artifacts might be off-limits to those who don't have enough coins!'
'Please choose carefully. They're precious artifacts from the great houses.'

Which one should we choose?

result:
I open the leftmost box.
In it is an axe, the same one that the Shi family members use.

If I'm remembering correctly, this axe should be able to charge up to create powerful ripples...
This'll be useful for the Sinners.

We take the artifact and leave the room.

I open the leftmost box.
In it is an axe, the same one that the Shi family members use.

If I'm remembering correctly, this axe should be able to charge up to create powerful ripples...
This'll be useful for the Sinners.

We take the artifact and leave the room.

options.message:
Wang Family's Artifact
<size=75%><color=#a16a3b>Choice unlocked when carrying 10 or more coin(s)</color></size>
result:
I open the second box from the left.
In it is a talisman, the same one that the Wang family members use.

These talismans each seemed to possess a special power... they should come in pretty handy.
This'll be useful for the Sinners.

We take the artifact and leave the room.

I open the second box from the left.
In it is a talisman, the same one that the Wang family members use.

These talismans each seemed to possess a special power... they should come in pretty handy.
This'll be useful for the Sinners.

We take the artifact and leave the room.

options.message:
Xue Family's Artifact
<size=75%><color=#a16a3b>Choice unlocked when carrying 20 or more coin(s)</color></size>
result:
I open the second box from the right.
In it is a podao, the same one that the Xue family's vagabond warriors use.

This sword was huge, but... they swung it around like it weighed only as much as a feather.
This'll be useful for the Sinners.

We take the artifact and leave the room.

I open the second box from the right.
In it is a podao, the same one that the Xue family's vagabond warriors use.

This sword was huge, but... they swung it around like it weighed only as much as a feather.
This'll be useful for the Sinners.

We take the artifact and leave the room.

options.message:
Jia Family's Artifact
<size=75%><color=#a16a3b>Choice unlocked when carrying 25 or more coin(s)</color></size>
result:
I open the rightmost box.
In it is an auspiciously colored Bolus from the Jia family.

It should have some impressive qualities, given that it is one of H Corp.'s Singularities.
This'll be useful for the Sinners.

We take the artifact and leave the room.

I open the rightmost box.
In it is an auspiciously colored Bolus from the Jia family.

It should have some impressive qualities, given that it is one of H Corp.'s Singularities.
This'll be useful for the Sinners.

We take the artifact and leave the room.

dataList.name: 막바지_보너스
dataList.desc: Happiness and laughter are but illusions. Sorrow and grief are but illusions also. Avarice, yearning, and longing are but manifestations of one's vacuity. We run into a different candidate's clan in a narrow hallway. 'Feel free to duke it out, but... with the candidates' mutual agreement...' 'I think we can turn this battle into a more interesting game.' 'It's up to the both of you, though!'

options.messageDesc: Begin a combat encounter. Win to gain coin(s).
result:
No need to gamble when we most likely have the upper hand anyway.
We decide to fight them as we always do.

options.message:
Make a wager.
<size=75%><color=#a16a3b>Choice unlocked when carrying 5 or more coin(s)</color></size>
options.messageDesc: Run a Lust and Gluttony Advantage check. Pass to gain coin(s), fail to lose coin(s).

dataList.name: 막바지_보너스_내기_패배
dataList.desc: I mean, do we have to hand over our coins? Why don't we just beat them up and take our coins back? Actually... hey, nothing's stopping us from beating them up and taking their coins, too! The question is... should we?

options.messageDesc: - Begin a combat encounter. Win to gain coin(s).
result:
'Another day, another excellent display of a highly discerning judgement call, Executive Manager!'
'Sob... Manager Esquire... wherefore dost thou commit such villainy...?'

The Sinners comment on my decision before rushing at the opposing candidate.

They won the game fair and square. Let's accept our defeat with grace and move on.

We leave the coins and move on, albeit reluctantly.
